successes.title: MAGNETIC: Paper That Sticks to Walls
successes.description: Reinvented paper that you can stick to any surface without any pins, glue, buttons, or thumb tacks.

Pledges.description: Thank you for your support! We will put your name on the supporters desk on our website. You will also get updates on the campaign!
TRIAL KIT of Magnetic NOTES. Be the first to enjoy them. Get 1 S-size, 1 M-size, and 1 L-size Notes of 100 sheets each. We will ask you to choose the colors. Approximately 7 USD or 6 EUR.
Magnetic NOTES. 3 S-size, 3 M-size, and 3 L-size Notes of 100 sheets each. We will ask you to choose the colors. Approximately 21 USD or 19 EUR.
Magnetic BOARDS. 15 erasable boards in a tube. Great choice for office equipment or for sticking on the walls in a kid's room! Approximately 23 USD or 21 EUR.
Magnetic SHEETS. 50 printable Magnetic sheets for any home or office printer. Stick the print-outs to the wall without glue or thumb tacks! Approximately 36 USD or 32 EUR.
Magnetic PADS. Get one A5, one A4, and one A3 Pad. Best option for instant classifieds and paintings! Approximately 39 USD or 34 EUR.
Kit 1. One Magnetic Notes of each size, one Magnetic A4 Pad, 5 Magnetic Boards, and 50 Magnetic Sheets. Try out all the Magnetic products! Approximately 67 USD or 59 EUR.
Kit 2. Three Magnetic Notes of each size, One A4 Pad, 10 Magnetic Boards, and 100 Magnetic Sheets. Approximately 124 USD or 109 EUR.
Kit 3. The fullest offer! Five Magnetic Notes of each size, one Magnetic Pad of each size, 20 Magnetic Boards, and 150 Magnetic Sheets. Approximately 216 USD or 190 EUR.

Do you love a challenge as much as we do? Do you want to spread kindness to the world? No serious plans for autumn 2015? Ok, let's go to Africa with us! We’ll hire an SUV and spend 5-7 days on a challenging trip full of new impressions. We need to equip dozens of schools with Magnetic. What? A little scared? Yes, Africa isn’t Europe. But we wouldn’t plan such a trip if it weren’t so challenging! Don’t worry, we’ll hire a security guy. Join our expedition and let the world know that you can put your money where your mouth is! [invitation only, all expenses excluded]
